IN DEVELOPMENT - An animated representation of patient data footprints (the quantity, and type of data that is recorded) at different risk values. Opaque nodes represent data that a primary care provider (PCP) cannot see! ...Using this as proxy for understanding whether integrated data is cause of adverse drug reactions..
